text: (o pravakta!) Ila anu: "Niscayanga nenu kuda milanti oka manavunni matrame! Naku divyajnanam (vahi) dvara ila telupabadindi: 'Niscayanga, mi aradhya devudu, oke okka devudu (allah); kavuna miru neruga ayana vaipunake maralandi mariyu ayanane ksamapanakai vedukondi.' " Mariyu ayana (allah) ku sati kalpince variki vinasam undi
